text: @ChuckCallesto It be fun to give them timeline of what Pelosi did by ignoring bill that emergency spending bill for the #COVID19 in feb24 and instead try to pass a bill in banning flavors tobacco. "So you knew b4 how deadly it could be? Yet your actions doesn't show it?"
